net.minecraft.block

クラス Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistryEntry<Block>
      • net.minecraft.block.Block
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    IItemProvider, IForgeBlock, IForgeRegistryEntry<Block>
    直系の既知のサブクラス:
    AbstractCoralPlantBlock, AbstractPressurePlateBlock, AbstractRailBlock, AirBlock, BambooBlock, BambooSaplingBlock, BarrierBlock, BedrockBlock, BreakableBlock, BubbleColumnBlock, BushBlock, CactusBlock, CakeBlock, CarpetBlock, CartographyTableBlock, CauldronBlock, ChorusFlowerBlock, ComposterBlock, ContainerBlock, CoralBlock, CraftingTableBlock, DirectionalBlock, DoorBlock, EndPortalFrameBlock, FallingBlock, FarmlandBlock, FireBlock, FlowerPotBlock, FlowingFluidBlock, FourWayBlock, GrassPathBlock, HorizontalBlock, HugeMushroomBlock, KelpBlock, KelpTopBlock, LadderBlock, LanternBlock, LeavesBlock, MagmaBlock, NetherPortalBlock, NoteBlock, OreBlock, RedstoneBlock, RedstoneLampBlock, RedstoneOreBlock, RedstoneWireBlock, RotatedPillarBlock, ScaffoldingBlock, SilverfishBlock, SixWayBlock, SlabBlock, SnowBlock, SnowyDirtBlock, SoulSandBlock, SpongeBlock, StairsBlock, StemGrownBlock, StonecutterBlock, StructureVoidBlock, SugarCaneBlock, TNTBlock, TorchBlock, TripWireBlock, TripWireHookBlock, TurtleEggBlock, VineBlock, WebBlock, WetSpongeBlock

    public class Block
extends ForgeRegistryEntry<Block>
implements IItemProvider, IForgeBlock

public static final ObjectIntIdentityMap<BlockState> BLOCK_STATE_IDS
        非推奨です。 

      • lightValue

        protected final int lightValue
        Amount of light emitted

      • blockHardness

        protected final float blockHardness
        Indicates how many hits it takes to break a block.

      • blockResistance

        protected final float blockResistance
        Indicates how much this block can resist explosions

      • ticksRandomly

        protected final boolean ticksRandomly
        Flags whether or not this block is of a type that needs random ticking. Ref-counted by ExtendedBlockStorage in order to broadly cull a chunk from the random chunk update list for efficiency's sake.

      • soundType

        protected final SoundType soundType

      • material

        protected final Material material

      • materialColor

      • updateNeighbors

        @Deprecated
public void updateNeighbors(BlockState stateIn,
                                         IWorld worldIn,
                                         BlockPos pos,
                                         int flags)
        非推奨です。 
        For all neighbors, have them react to this block's existence, potentially updating their states as needed. For example, fences make their connections to this block if possible and observers pulse if this block was placed in front of their detector

      • isIn

        public boolean isIn(Tag<Block> tagIn)

      • getValidBlockForPosition

        public static BlockState getValidBlockForPosition(BlockState currentState,
                                                  IWorld worldIn,
                                                  BlockPos pos)
        With the provided block state, performs neighbor checks for all neighboring blocks to get an "adjusted" blockstate for placement in the world, if the current state is not valid.

      • replaceBlock

        public static void replaceBlock(BlockState oldState,
                                BlockState newState,
                                IWorld worldIn,
                                BlockPos pos,
                                int flags)
        Replaces oldState with newState, possibly playing effects and creating drops. Flags are as in World.setBlockState(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos, net.minecraft.block.BlockState, int)

      • updateDiagonalNeighbors

        @Deprecated
public void updateDiagonalNeighbors(BlockState state,
                                                 IWorld worldIn,
                                                 BlockPos pos,
                                                 int flags)
        非推奨です。 
        performs updates on diagonal neighbors of the target position and passes in the flags. The flags can be referenced from the docs for IWorldWriter#setBlockState(IBlockState, BlockPos, int).

      • updatePostPlacement

        @Deprecated
public BlockState updatePostPlacement(BlockState stateIn,
                                                   Direction facing,
                                                   BlockState facingState,
                                                   IWorld worldIn,
                                                   BlockPos currentPos,
                                                   BlockPos facingPos)
        非推奨です。 
        Update the provided state given the provided neighbor facing and neighbor state, returning a new state. For example, fences make their connections to the passed in state if possible, and wet concrete powder immediately returns its solidified counterpart. Note that this method should ideally consider only the specific face passed in.

      • rotate

        @Deprecated
public BlockState rotate(BlockState state,
                                      Rotation rot)
        非推奨です。 call via IBlockState#withRotation(Rotation) whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
        Returns the blockstate with the given rotation from the passed blockstate. If inapplicable, returns the passed blockstate.

      • mirror

        @Deprecated
public BlockState mirror(BlockState state,
                                      Mirror mirrorIn)
        非推奨です。 call via IBlockState#withMirror(Mirror) whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
        Returns the blockstate with the given mirror of the passed blockstate. If inapplicable, returns the passed blockstate.

public BlockRenderType getRenderType(BlockState state)
        非推奨です。 call via IBlockState#getRenderType() whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
        The type of render function called. MODEL for mixed tesr and static model, MODELBLOCK_ANIMATED for TESR-only, LIQUID for vanilla liquids, INVISIBLE to skip all rendering

      • ticksRandomly

        public boolean ticksRandomly(BlockState state)
        Returns whether or not this block is of a type that needs random ticking. Called for ref-counting purposes by ExtendedBlockStorage in order to broadly cull a chunk from the random chunk update list for efficiency's sake.

      • eventReceived

        @Deprecated
public boolean eventReceived(BlockState state,
                                          World worldIn,
                                          BlockPos pos,
                                          int id,
                                          int param)
        非推奨です。 call via IBlockState#onBlockEventReceived(World,BlockPos,int,int) whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
        Called on server when World#addBlockEvent is called. If server returns true, then also called on the client. On the Server, this may perform additional changes to the world, like pistons replacing the block with an extended base. On the client, the update may involve replacing tile entities or effects such as sounds or particles

      • getSlipperiness

        public float getSlipperiness(BlockState state,
                             IWorldReader world,
                             BlockPos pos,
                             @Nullable
                             Entity entity)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IForgeBlock
        Gets the slipperiness at the given location at the given state. Normally between 0 and 1.

        Note that entities may reduce slipperiness by a certain factor of their own; for net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase, this is .91. net.minecraft.entity.item.EntityItem uses .98, and net.minecraft.entity.projectile.EntityFishHook uses .92.

        定義:
        getSlipperiness インタフェース内 IForgeBlock
        パラメータ:
        state - state of the block
        world - the world
        pos - the position in the world
        entity - the entity in question
        戻り値:
        the factor by which the entity's motion should be multiplied

      • getHarvestTool

        @Nullable
public ToolType getHarvestTool(BlockState state)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IForgeBlock
        Queries the class of tool required to harvest this block, if null is returned we assume that anything can harvest this block.
        定義:
        getHarvestTool インタフェース内 IForgeBlock

      • getHarvestLevel

        public int getHarvestLevel(BlockState state)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IForgeBlock
        Queries the harvest level of this item stack for the specified tool class, Returns -1 if this tool is not of the specified type
        定義:
        getHarvestLevel インタフェース内 IForgeBlock
        戻り値:
        Harvest level, or -1 if not the specified tool type.

      • canSustainPlant

        public boolean canSustainPlant(BlockState state,
                               IBlockReader world,
                               BlockPos pos,
                               Direction facing,
                               IPlantable plantable)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IForgeBlock
        Determines if this block can support the passed in plant, allowing it to be planted and grow. Some examples: Reeds check if its a reed, or if its sand/dirt/grass and adjacent to water Cacti checks if its a cacti, or if its sand Nether types check for soul sand Crops check for tilled soil Caves check if it's a solid surface Plains check if its grass or dirt Water check if its still water
        定義:
        canSustainPlant インタフェース内 IForgeBlock
        パラメータ:
        state - The Current state
        world - The current world
        facing - The direction relative to the given position the plant wants to be, typically its UP
        plantable - The plant that wants to check
        戻り値:
        True to allow the plant to be planted/stay.

      • getTags

        public final java.util.Set<ResourceLocation> getTags()
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IForgeBlock
        Retrieves a list of tags names this is known to be associated with. This should be used in favor of TagCollection.getOwningTags, as this caches the result and automatically updates when the TagCollection changes.
        定義:
        getTags インタフェース内 IForgeBlock
